document.full_text: president dmitry medvedev gave prime minister vladimir putin a july 1 deadline on saturday to begin the process of removing russian ministers from state firm boards, a move which could clip the wings of top putin allies.
document.title: kremlin to putin: start state board purge by july 1
lines_and_colors: president dmitry medvedev gave prime minister vladimir putin a july 1 deadline on saturday to begin the process of removing russian ministers from state firm boards, a move which could clip the wings of top putin allies.
